mapper.select: SELECT OSTR_IZ.ITM_OSTR_NO AS ITM_OSTR_NO /* 품목출고번호 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_TP_CD AS OSTR_TP_CD /* 출고유형코드 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO AS OSTR_WARE_NO /* 출고창고번호 */ , WARE_IZ.WARE_NM AS WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ , WARE_IZ.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_DT AS OSTR_DT /* 출고일자 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_SN AS OSTR_SN /* 출고순번 */ , OSTR_IZ.ITM_PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , PD_BAS.PD_NM AS ITM_NM /* 품목명 */ , PD_BAS.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_ABBR_NM /* 품목명약어 */ , OSTR_IZ.ITM_KND_CD AS ITM_KND_CD /* 품목구분코드 */ , OSTR_IZ.ITM_GD_CD AS ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , OSTR_IZ.MNGT_UNIT_CD AS MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_RSON_CD AS OSTR_RSON_CD /* 출고사유코드 */ , CASE OSTR_IZ.ITM_GD_CD WHEN 'A' THEN NVL(STOC_IZ.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) - NVL(STOC_IZ.MMT_STOC_A_GD_QTY, 0) WHEN 'B' THEN NVL(STOC_IZ.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) - NVL(STOC_IZ.MMT_STOC_B_GD_QTY, 0) WHEN 'E' THEN NVL(STOC_IZ.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) - NVL(STOC_IZ.MMT_STOC_E_GD_QTY, 0) WHEN 'R' THEN NVL(STOC_IZ.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) - NVL(STOC_IZ.MMT_STOC_R_GD_QTY, 0) ELSE 0 END AS ON_QTY /* 시점재고수량 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_QTY AS OSTR_QTY /* 출고수량 */ , OSTR_IZ.RMK_CN AS RMK_CN /* 비고 */ , OSTR_IZ.OSTR_AK_SN AS OSTR_AK_SN /* 출고요청일련번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(PD_BAS.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ OSTR_IZ /* 품목출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ ON WARE_IZ.WARE_NO = OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO AND WARE_IZ.APY_YM = SUBSTR(OSTR_DT,1,6) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PD_BAS /* 상품기본 */ ON PD_BAS.PD_CD = OSTR_IZ.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ ON STOC_IZ.WARE_NO = OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO AND STOC_IZ.ITM_PD_CD = OSTR_IZ.ITM_PD_CD WHERE OSTR_IZ.ITM_OSTR_NO = #{itmOstrNo} AND OSTR_IZ.OSTR_WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo} AND WARE_IZ.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND OSTR_IZ.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY OSTR_IZ.OSTR_SN
SELECT '217' ||#{ostrDt} || LPAD(SQ_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ$ITM_OSTR_NO.NEXTVAL,7,'0') AS ITM_OSTR_NO /* 품목출고번호 */ FROM DUAL
SELECT T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo} AND T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ ( /* 품목출고내역 */ ITM_OSTR_NO /* 품목출고번호 */ , OSTR_SN /* 출고일련번호 */ , OSTR_TP_CD /* 출고유형코드 */ , OSTR_WARE_NO /* 출고창고번호 */ , OSTR_DT /* 출고일자 */ , ITM_KND_CD /* 품목종류코드 */ , ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , OSTR_WARE_DV_CD /* 출고창고구분코드 */ , MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , BOX_UNIT_QTY /* 박스단위수량 */ , ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , OSTR_QTY /* 출고수량 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /* 창고관리파트너조직유형코드 */ , OSTR_RSON_CD /* 출고사유코드 */ , STR_AK_WARE_DV_CD /* 입고요청창고구분코드*/ , STR_WARE_NO /* 입고창고번호 */ , DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ , RMK_CN /* 비고내용 */ ) SELECT #{itmOstrNo} , ${ostrSn} , #{ostrTpCd} , #{ostrWareNo} , #{ostrDt} , #{itmKndCd} , #{itmPdCd} , (SELECT WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{ostrDt}, 1, 6) AND WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo}) , #{mngtUnitCd} , 0 , #{itmGdCd} , ${ostrQty} , #{wareMngtPrtnrNo} , (SELECT T1.OG_TP_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{ostrDt}, 1, 6) AND T1.WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo} AND T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = #{wareMngtPrtnrNo}) , #{ostrRsonCd} , (SELECT WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{ostrDt}, 1, 6) AND WARE_NO = #{ostrWareNo}) , #{bilDept} , 'N' , #{rmkCn}
FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT T1.DEPT_CD AS CODE_ID /* 부서코드 */ , T1.DEPT_NM3||'('||T1.DEPT_CD ||')' AS CODE_NAME /* 부서명 */ FROM TB_GBCO_DEPT_BAS T1 /* 부서기본 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEPT_DV_VAL = '1' ORDER BY DEPT_NM3, DEPT_CD

SELECT A.WARE_NO AS CODE_ID /*창고번호*/ , A.WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME /*창고명*/ , A.WARE_DV_CD AS WARE_DV_CD /*창고구분코드*/ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ A /* 월별창고내역(상위) */ WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.WARE_DV_CD = '3' AND A.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30' AND A.APY_YM = #{apyYm} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.SORT_DV_VAL), A.WARE_NM, A.WARE_NO
